function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious disease spread due to close contact in confined spaces and lack of physical distancing measures","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and transmission of contagious diseases leading to illness and potential death","Mitigation":"Implement strict physical distancing measures and guidelines for infection control in confined spaces","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, air purification systems, and UV-C disinfection technology","People":"People in confined spaces, particularly those in close contact with others","Owner":"Health authorities, building management, and individuals in confined spaces"},{"Description":"Psychological impact of restrictive measures and social isolation","Impact":"Higher levels of stress, anxiety, depression, and PTSD among the adult population","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support, promote social connections, and create safe spaces for social interaction","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mental health apps, and virtual support groups","People":"Adult population affected by restrictive measures and social isolation","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health professionals, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Gender disparities in anxiety and depression","Impact":"Higher levels of anxiety and depression reported by women compared to men","Mitigation":"Address gender inequalities, provide gender-specific mental health support, and promote gender-sensitive interventions","Technologies":"Gender-specific mental health resources and educational programs","People":"Women and men affected by anxiety and depression","Owner":"Gender advocacy groups, mental health organizations, and policymakers"}]}
